goal.tools.unittest.result.testsection

Class TestSectionInterupted

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • goal.tools.unittest.result.testsection.TestSectionFailed
          • goal.tools.unittest.result.testsection.TestSectionInterupted
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestSectionResult, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EvaluateInInterrupted

    public class TestSectionInterupted
extends TestSectionFailed
    Exception used in a TestResult to show that while running a test section the debugger was killed.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje
    See Also:
    Test, Serialized Form
